channel.title: C++ Boost question
channel.description:
I'm still struggling with cross-compiling libtorrent, which relies on boost libraries. Has anyone else cross compiled anything that uses boost? If so, how did you do it?
edit: I've got it to build 32 and 64 bit linux executables, and a 32-bit windows executable I haven't tested yet, mostly by trial and error, but I have to say bjam is the worst build system I've ever used...

item.title: C++ Boost question
